div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1443 Asia Minor, 1965 Burial: c. 310 B.C. (M) Contents: 29+ AR Alexander III: 26 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 5, Sardes 3, Side 1, Tarsus 8, Myriandrus 2, Aradus 2, Byblus 1, Ace 2, Damascus 1, unc. mint 1) Imit. Alexander III: 1 tetradr. ANS 1965.306.3 Philip III: 2 tetradr. (Aradus 1 ANS 1965.306.3, Marathus 1) Disposition: New York 3 Record of varieties in ANS Latest date at Ace yr. 33 (= 313 B.C.)
